title: Time / clock has disappeared from notifications bar after update
content:
After the most recent update (Android 10 I think?) the time / clock has disappeared from my notifications bar.

I just have the battery, wifi, signal etc symbols on the right of the notification bar and nothing on the left.

Sometimes if i get a notification there will be a gap/empty space next to it in the bar, where the clock obviously should be.

There is no clock showing on the homescreen at all, so the only way I can check the time is to lock the phone and then wake up the lock screen.
